itunes:subtitle: Misinformation and disinformation online about COVID-19 continues to have real-world consequences for the virus' spread. This week, moderators of popular Reddit communities wrote an open letter to the company calling upon administrators to take action against misinformation on the platform. We hear from moderators about the open letter and Reddit CEO Steve Huffman's response.

media:content.media:description: Screen shot of the open letter from moderators to Reddit administrators, calling on them to take stronger action against misinformation on the platform.
